level.heading: MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS FOR NURSE AIDE TRAINEES (ยง 29-3207)

level.text: Each nurse aide trainee, after October 1, 1990, shall be able to understand, speak, read, and write the English language at the fourth (4th) grade level.
Each nurse aide trainee shall be provided information on the policies governing admission, retention, dismissal, and the course requirements of the nurse aide training program in writing.

Each nurse aide trainee shall be admitted on individual merit without discrimination by reason of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, age, marital status, personal appearance, sexual orientation, family responsibility, matriculation, political affiliation, physical handicap, source of income, and place of residence or business.
Each nurse aide trainee shall be free of communicable disease as verified in writing by a licensed physician.
